example.eg: The American flag is recognized throughout the world.
example.egtrans: 世界各地的人都认识美国国旗。

example.eg: We put a flag outside the house to announce the baby.
example.egtrans: 我们在屋外放了一面横幅，告知大家孩子的降临。

example.eg: The errors were flagged in the margin.
example.egtrans: 错误都在页边上标示出来了。

example.eg: The doorman will flag a cab for you.
The sailors used a semaphore system to flag messages.
example.egtrans: 水手们根据一种视觉通信系统，用旗子打旗号来传达信息。

example.eg: Ships use coloured bunting to flag messages to one another.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向某人发送...的信号, 向某人传递...的信号

example.eg: The horse began to flag as it neared the winning post.
example.egtrans: 在接近终点杆时，那匹马开始减速。

example.eg: The racing drivers sped towards the flag.
The flag was a large cruiser, with powerful guns.
A newspaper's flag is on the top of page one.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 报头, 印在报头的报刊名

dsense.name: flag
dsense.guideword: slang (American football: penalty) (俚语，腰旗橄榄球)

example.eg: The football team got a flag because of a bad foul by the other team.
Moss is growing between the flags of the patio.
It's hard to flag down a taxi during the rush hour. Julie was lost and had no signal on her phone; she had to flag down a passing car to ask for help.
example.egtrans: 在上下班高峰时段很难叫到一辆出租车。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给信号使停下, 挥手拦车
腰旗橄榄球, 夺旗式橄榄球

dsense.name: flag-bearer
dsense.guideword: ([sb] who carries a flag in a parade, etc.)

dsense.name: flag-bearer
dsense.guideword: figurative ([sb] who advocates strongly for a cause) (比喻义)

example.eg: I'm sick and tired of all his flag-waving.
The flag-waving family celebrates every national holiday enthusiastically.

dsense.name: flagpole, flag pole, flag-pole, pole
dsense.guideword: (mast from which a flag is flown)

example.eg: The Girl Scouts raised the flag on the flagpole.
The national flag of Scotland is navy blue with a white St Andrews Cross.

dsense.name: quarantine flag, yellow flag, also UK: yellow jack

trans_examp.trans_cn: 检疫旗, 黄色检疫旗

example.eg: The red flag no longer flies over the Kremlin.
Drinking more than four beers every evening is a definite red flag for alcoholism.
His constant complaining was acting as a red flag to me.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 挑衅, 让人冒火之事

dsense.name: Union Jack, Union flag
dsense.guideword: UK (United Kingdom national flag) (英国国旗)

example.eg: Cooking him his favourite meal is her way of showing a white flag.
